data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Marquina, Daniel, Osca, David, Rodríguez, Jorge, Fernández-Despiau, Estrella, Noreña, Carolina (2014): State of knowledge of the Acotylea (Polycladida, Platyhelminthes) from the Mediterranean coasts of Spain: new records and new species. Zootaxa 3780 (1): 108-134, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3780.1.4
